Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Flap extension asymmetry. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Landing Gear component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 22/09/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta
